 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Uses of Package
org.kiji.schema

Packages that use org.kiji.schema
org.kiji.schema The main package for users of Kiji Schema. 
org.kiji.schema.filter Filters used when reading data from Kiji tables. 
org.kiji.schema.impl Implementations for the main Kiji Schema classes and interfaces. 
org.kiji.schema.layout Kiji table layouts. 
org.kiji.schema.layout.impl Implementation for Kiji table layout management. 
org.kiji.schema.mapreduce Kiji map-reduce utilities. 
org.kiji.schema.tools Package containing implementations, abstract base classes, and exceptions for kiji command-line tools. 
org.kiji.schema.util Utilities. 
 

Classes in org.kiji.schema used by org.kiji.schema
EntityId
          EntityId is used to identify a particular row in a Kiji table.
EntityIdFactory
          Factory class for creating EntityIds.
HBaseScanOptions
          Customizable parameters for KijiRowScanners backed by an HBase scan.
KeyValueBackedWrapper
          Base class of wrappers that use KeyValues as the internal representation of wrapped data.
Kiji
          Kiji instance class that contains configuration and table information.
KijiCell
          The data held in one cell of a kiji table.
KijiCellDecoder
          Base class for decoders that read data from kiji cells.
KijiCellDecoderFactory
          A factory for creating KijiCellDecoders.
KijiCellEncoder
          Serializes a KijiCell.
KijiCellFormat
          Kiji cell encoding format.
KijiColumnName
          A Kiji column name is composed of one or two parts: a family and a qualifier.
KijiConfiguration
          The configuration for a single instance of Kiji, as a cluster could contain multiple instances.
KijiCounter
          A counter value stored in a column of a Kiji table.
KijiDataRequest
          Describes a request for columns of data to read from a Kiji table.
KijiDataRequest.Column
          Describes a request for a Kiji Table column.
KijiDataWrapper
          Base class for wrappers of data used in KijiDataWriters.
KijiDataWriter
          Base class for writers of Kiji data to different output sinks.
KijiDataWriter.Options
          Describes the options that can be configured on the KijiDataWriter.
KijiInvalidNameException
          Thrown when a Kiji instance or table layout name is invalid.
KijiManagedHBaseTableName
          Multiple instances of Kiji can be installed on a single HBase cluster.
KijiMetaTable
          The kiji metadata table, which stores layouts and other user defined meta data on a per-table basis.
KijiRowData
          The input data for a single entity in Kiji.
KijiRowScanner
          Interface for scanning over rows read from a Kiji table.
KijiSchemaTable
          The Kiji schema table, which contains the lookup table between schema IDs, hashes, and full schemas.
KijiSystemTable
          The Kiji system table, which stores system information such as the version, ready state, and locks.
KijiTable
          Interface for Kiji Tables.
KijiTableFactory
          Factory for KijiTable instances.
KijiTableKeyValueDatabase
          A database of per table key-value pairs.
KijiTablePool.Options
          Describes the options that can be configured on the KijiTablePool.
KijiTableReader
          Interface for reading data from a kiji table.
KijiTableWriter
          Interface for performing writes to a Kiji table.
KijiURI
          URI that fully qualifies a Kiji instance/table/column.
KijiURIException
          Thrown when parsing a bogus Kiji table URI.
NotAKijiManagedTableException
          Thrown when Kiji encounters an HBase table that is not managed by Kiji.
PutLocalApiWriter
          A Kiji data writer that outputs writes to the local Kiji table using the Kiji java API.
PutLocalApiWriter.Options
          Describes the options that can be configured on the PutLocalApiWriter.
PutWrapper
          Used by implementations of WrappedDataWriters to wrap data in Puts.
WrappedDataWriter
          Base class for writers of Kiji data writers that use a wrapper to aid with encapsulating and buffering data.
WrappedDataWriter.Options
          Describes the options that can be configured on the WrappedDataWriter.

          The Kiji schema table, which contains the lookup table between schema IDs, hashes, and full schemas.
NoSuchColumnException
          Thrown when attempting to access a column that does not exist.
